parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.48

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns currently selected throwable, which will be launched if the user presses "G".<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> The weapon/magazine id system is W.I.P. and may change without notice.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[currentThrowable]] player

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> player: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] in format [magazineClassName, muzzleClassName, [magazineId, creatorId]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[currentThrowable]] [[player]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>["SmokeShellGreen", "SmokeShellGreenMuzzle", [1.00002e+007, 0]]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ct = [[currentThrowable]] [[player]];				<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>["HandGrenade", "HandGrenadeMuzzle", [1e+007, 0]]</value></part></template>
_id = (_ct [[select]] 2 [[select]] 0) - 1e+007;		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>18</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[currentWeapon]], [[currentMagazine]], [[currentMuzzle]], [[BIS_fnc_isThrowable]]
</value></part></template></root>
